EmailTemplate.name: COB-EmailTemplate-RequestAccess-RequesteeNotification
EmailTemplate.Body:
Hello $launcherDisplayName, 

#if ( $approvalSet )

 #if ( $approvalSet.hasApproved() )  

This email is to notify you that your request for additional access for your AccessBoston account has been approved. 

#foreach ($item in $approvalSet.approved) 

Application: $item.applicationName 

Please confirm the icon for this application appears for you on the AccessBoston portal and you can access it. 

#end 

#end 

#end

#if ( $approvalSet.hasRejected() ) 

This email is to notify you that your request for additional access for your AccessBoston account has been rejected. 

#foreach ($item in $approvalSet.rejected) 

Application: $item.applicationName 

Please confer with your manager if you believe this rejection was in error. 

#end

#end

Sincerely, AccessBoston

 

Questions about the access request process should be directed to the DoIT Service Desk via 617-635-7378 or BPS Technology Help Desk Support  at 617-635-9200.

Please Note: this is an auto-generated email, please do not reply to this email.

 

The information contained in this communication, including any attachments, is intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom it is addressed and others authorized to receive it. It may contain confidential or legally privileged information. If you are not the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, distribution or taking any action in reliance on the contents of this information is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful. If you have received this communication in error, please notify us immediately by responding to this email and then delete it from your system. The sender is neither liable for the proper and complete transmission of the information contained in this communication nor for any delay in its receipt.
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying users when accounts have been changed through Life Cycle Manager. Note that in addition to the declared arguments, all workflow variables, Step arguments, and Approval arguments defined in the Workflow are also available.

Argument.name: approvalSet
Argument.Description: The ApprovalSet object contained in the workflow.

Argument.name: launcher
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that launched the workflow.

Argument.name: identityDisplayName
Argument.Description: The display name of the Identity that is being changed.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Changes to your Identity were processed
